item.title: About my thesis
item.description: There is an 1-year embargo on my thesis. From 27th September, 2025, I plan to make accessible: my thesis (PDF) on HAL -> link on the left the thesis template on GitHub (development + issues) + Zenodo (DOI) + Overleaf (for you) -> in “Tools” the many figures (made with BioRender) -> here

item.title: Welcome to my GitHub Pages !
item.description: I’ve been planning to build my GitHub Pages for a while - and I finally did it ! The current theme is: hugo-theme-relearn.
